mapper.sql: SIGN_DATE, CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE, CREATED_USER, AREA_CODE, SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS, UPDATED_DATE, STATUS, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, WEBSITE, VALID_IND, CREATED_DATE, CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE, LEGAL, VALID_DATE, MEDIUM_ENAME, PROFESSION, LICENCE, UPDATED_USER, EXPIRE_DATE, CHANNEL_LEVEL, CITY_CODE, SALE_POLICY_NAME, SIMPLE_NAME, REGISTER_ADDRESS, COUNTRY, CHANNEL_CODE, PARTER_LEVEL, MEDIUM_CNAME, FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG, INNER_CODE, SUPPORT_FLAG, PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE, AGENT_CODE, PROCESS_USER_CODE, C_AGENTORG_CDE, C_UKEY_CDE, CHEAT_CODE

SIGN_DATE as "signDate", CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE as "channelExtendCode", CREATED_USER as "createdUser", AREA_CODE as "areaCode", SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS as "salePolicyAddress", UPDATED_DATE as "updatedDate", STATUS as "status", CHILD_DEPT_LOOK as "childDeptLook", WEBSITE as "website", VALID_IND as "validInd", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE as "channelOuterCode", LEGAL as "legal", VALID_DATE as "validDate", MEDIUM_ENAME as "mediumEname", PROFESSION as "profession", LICENCE as "licence", UPDATED_USER as "updatedUser", EXPIRE_DATE as "expireDate", CHANNEL_LEVEL as "channelLevel", CITY_CODE as "cityCode", SALE_POLICY_NAME as "salePolicyName", SIMPLE_NAME as "simpleName", REGISTER_ADDRESS as "registerAddress", COUNTRY as "country", CHANNEL_CODE as "channelCode", PARTER_LEVEL as "parterLevel", MEDIUM_CNAME as "mediumCname", FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG as "financePolicyFlag", INNER_CODE as "innerCode", SUPPORT_FLAG as "supportFlag", PROCESS_DEPT_CODE as "processDeptCode", PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE as "parentChannelCode", AGENT_CODE as "agentCode", PROCESS_USER_CODE as "processUserCode", CHEAT_CODE as "cheatCode"
mapper.update:
update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE = #{channelExtendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS = #{salePolicyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE = #{channelOuterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL = #{legal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MEDIUM_ENAME = #{mediumEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_POLICY_NAME = #{salePolicyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_ADDRESS = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTER_LEVEL = #{parterLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEDIUM_CNAME = #{mediumCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG = #{financePolicyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
INNER_CODE = #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPORT_FLAG = #{supportFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = #{processDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = #{parentChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_USER_CODE = #{processUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL set SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE = #{channelExtendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS = #{salePolicyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR}, WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE = #{channelOuterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL = #{legal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MEDIUM_ENAME = #{mediumEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=CHAR}, LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_POLICY_NAME = #{salePolicyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_ADDRESS = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTER_LEVEL = #{parterLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEDIUM_CNAME = #{mediumCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG = #{financePolicyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, INNER_CODE = #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPORT_FLAG = #{supportFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = #{processDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = #{parentChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_USER_CODE = #{processUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL
SIGN_DATE = to_date(#{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE = #{channelExtendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_POLICY_ADDRESS = #{salePolicyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = sysdate,
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE = #{channelOuterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL = #{legal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_DATE = to_date(#{validDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
MEDIUM_ENAME = #{mediumEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENCE = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_POLICY_NAME = #{salePolicyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIMPLE_NAME = #{simpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_ADDRESS = #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTER_LEVEL = #{parterLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEDIUM_CNAME = #{mediumCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG = #{financePolicyFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
INNER_CODE = #{innerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPORT_FLAG = #{supportFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = #{processDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = #{parentChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_USER_CODE = #{processUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE left join salesman sa on pb.APPROVE_CODE = sa.employ_code left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join channel_medium_contact fb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = fb.CHANNEL_CODE and fb.get_flag = 1 and fb.VALID_IND = 1 left join BUSINESS_LINE bl on pb.BUSINESS_LINE = bl.LINE_CODE and bl.VALID_IND = 1 left join CATEGORY cg on pb.CATEGORY = cg.CATEGORY_CODE and cg.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT deptp on cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = deptp.DEPT_CODE

select count(1) from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE
and pb.VALID_IND = 1 and cm.VALID_IND = 1

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select pb.DEPT_CODE, dept.dept_simple_name, pb.CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, deptp.dept_simple_name PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, decode(pb.APPROVE_FLAG, '1', '已审核', '0', '未审核', '已审核') APPROVE_FLAG, sa.salesman_cname APPROVE_CODE, decode(pb.valid_ind, '1', '否', '是') STATUS, cg.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY, bl.LINE_NAME BUSINESS_LINE, decode(MSG_CAR, '1', '是', '0', '否', '') MSG_CAR, decode(MSG_CUSTOMER, '1', '是', '0', '否', '') MSG_CUSTOMER, cm.UPDATED_DATE, decode(PARTER_LEVEL, '1', '分对分', '0', '总对总', '') PARTER_LEVEL,
( case when ( select case when max(clcr.expire_date) is not null and max(clcr.expire_date) < sysdate then '1' else '0' end from CHANNEL_CONFER clcr where clcr.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.channel_code and clcr.VALID_IND = '1' ) = '1' and cm.expire_date is not null and trunc(cm.expire_date) < trunc(sysdate) then '资质和协议过期' when cm.expire_date is not null and trunc(cm.expire_date) < trunc(sysdate) then '资质过期' when ( select case when max(clcr.expire_date) is not null and max(clcr.expire_date) < sysdate then '1' else '0' end from CHANNEL_CONFER clcr where clcr.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.channel_code and clcr.VALID_IND = '1' ) = '1' then '协议过期' when ( cm.expire_date is null or trunc(cm.expire_date) > trunc(sysdate) ) and ( select case when max(clcr.expire_date) is null or max(clcr.expire_date) > sysdate then '1' else '0' end from CHANNEL_CONFER clcr where clcr.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.channel_code and clcr.VALID_IND = '1' ) = '1' then '正在代理' else '---' end ) "newStatus"
from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE left join salesman sa on pb.APPROVE_CODE = sa.employ_code left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join channel_medium_contact fb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = fb.CHANNEL_CODE and fb.get_flag = 1 and fb.VALID_IND = 1 left join BUSINESS_LINE bl on pb.BUSINESS_LINE = bl.LINE_CODE and bl.VALID_IND = 1 left join CATEGORY cg on pb.CATEGORY = cg.CATEGORY_CODE and cg.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT deptp on cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = deptp.DEPT_CODE
order by cm.UPDATED_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select to_char(cm.SIGN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "SIGN_DATE", cm.CHANNEL_EXTEND_CODE, cm.STATUS, cm.CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, cm.WEBSITE, cm.CHANNEL_OUTER_CODE, cm.LEGAL, to_char(cm.VALID_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "VALID_DATE", cm.MEDIUM_ENAME, cm.PROFESSION, cm.LICENCE, to_char(cm.EXPIRE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "EXPIRE_DATE", cm.CHANNEL_LEVEL, cm.CITY_CODE, cm.SALE_POLICY_NAME, cm.SIMPLE_NAME, cm.REGISTER_ADDRESS, cm.COUNTRY, cm.CHANNEL_CODE, cm.PARTER_LEVEL, cm.MEDIUM_CNAME, cm.FINANCE_POLICY_FLAG, cm.INNER_CODE, cm.SUPPORT_FLAG, cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE || '-' || deptp.dept_simple_name PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, cm.AGENT_CODE, sa.c_emp_cnm || '(' || cm.PROCESS_USER_CODE || ')' PROCESS_USER_CODE, BANK_NODE, BANK_ACCOUNT, pb.REMARK, CHANNEL_CATEGORY, MISTAKE_CONTENT, pb.TEL, BANK_PROVINCE, BANK_RECEIVE, FINANCE_FLAG, CHANNEL_PROPERTY, pb.DEPT_CODE, OFFICE_ADDRESS, BANK_NAME, CONTACT, pb.BUSINESS_LINE, CHANNEL_FEATURE, BANK_CITY, MISTAKE_FLAG, CHANNEL_TYPE, CHANNEL_OWN_TYPE, CHANNEL_FLAG, CHANNEL_RATE, pb.DEPT_CODE || '-' || dept.dept_simple_name dept_simple_name, cm.PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE || '-' || cn.MEDIUM_CNAME PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE, cm.C_AGENTORG_CDE, cm.C_UKEY_CDE, cm.CHEAT_CODE, pb.TAXPAYER as "taxpayerName", pb.TAXPAYER_NO as "taxpayerIdNum", pb.TAXPAYER_QUALIFICATION as "taxpayerQualify", pb.TAX_INVOICE as "invoiceType", pb.TAX_RATE as "taxRate" from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on cm.CHANNEL_CODE = pb.CHANNEL_CODE and pb.VALID_IND = 1 left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cn on cm.PARENT_CHANNEL_CODE = cn.CHANNEL_CODE and cn.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join DEPARTMENT deptp on cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = deptp.DEPT_CODE left join t_emp_cde sa on cm.PROCESS_USER_CODE = sa.c_emp_cde where cm.CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode} and cm.VALID_IND = 1

select cmd.CHANNEL_CODE,cmd.MEDIUM_CNAME from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cmd left join CHANNEL_MAIN cm on cmd.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE where cm.DEPT_CODE like #{deptCode} || '%' and cmd.VALID_IND = 1 and cm.VALID_IND = 1 union all select cad.CHANNEL_CODE,cad.CHANNEL_NAME MEDIUM_CNAME from CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL cad left join CHANNEL_MAIN cm on cad.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE where cm.DEPT_CODE like #{deptCode} || '%' and cad.VALID_IND = 1 and cm.VALID_IND = 1

select
from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL

select
from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.select: select t.parent_dept_code,t.dept_code from department t where length(t.dept_code) != 6 start with t.dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by t.dept_code = prior t.parent_dept_code

select count(1) from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE
and pb.VALID_IND = 1 and cm.VALID_IND = 1

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select * from (select '--' DEPT_CODE, '无' dept_simple_name, '--' CHANNEL_CODE, '无' MEDIUM_CNAME, '无' PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, '--' STATUS, '' CATEGORY, '' BUSINESS_LINE, '' MSG_CAR, '' MSG_CUSTOMER, sysdate UPDATED_DATE, '' PARTER_LEVEL from dual union all select pb.DEPT_CODE, dept.dept_simple_name, pb.CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, deptp.dept_simple_name PROCESS_DEPT_CODE, decode(pb.STATUS, '1', '正在代理', '') STATUS, cg.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY, bl.LINE_NAME BUSINESS_LINE, decode(MSG_CAR, '1', '是', '0', '否', '') MSG_CAR, decode(MSG_CUSTOMER, '1', '是', '0', '否', '') MSG_CUSTOMER, cm.UPDATED_DATE, decode(PARTER_LEVEL, '195002', '隶属于分对分', '195001', '隶属于总对总', '--') PARTER_LEVEL from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL cm left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cm.CHANNEL_CODE and pb.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE and dept.VALID_IND = 1 left join (select * from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_CONTACT t1 where not exists (select 1 from CHANNEL_MEDIUM_CONTACT t2 where t1.CHANNEL_CODE = t2.CHANNEL_CODE and t1.CREATED_DATE > t2.CREATED_DATE and t2.valid_ind =1)) fb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = fb.CHANNEL_CODE and fb.VALID_IND = 1 left join BUSINESS_LINE bl on pb.BUSINESS_LINE = bl.LINE_CODE and bl.VALID_IND = 1 left join CATEGORY cg on pb.CATEGORY = cg.CATEGORY_CODE and cg.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT deptp on cm.PROCESS_DEPT_CODE = deptp.DEPT_CODE and deptp.VALID_IND = 1
and cm.VALID_IND = 1 group by pb.DEPT_CODE, dept.dept_simple_name, pb.CHANNEL_CODE, MEDIUM_CNAME, deptp.dept_simple_name, pb.STATUS, cg.CATEGORY_NAME, bl.LINE_NAME, MSG_CAR, MSG_CUSTOMER, cm.UPDATED_DATE, PARTER_LEVEL) order by PARTER_LEVEL desc,DEPT_CODE asc,channel_code ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}
{ call get_agt_no( #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=INOUT}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=IN}, #{category,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=IN}, #{property,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=IN})}
